fields.name: Parameters (resource)
fields.value:
`rp_name` - The name of the resource pack
`rp_description` - The description of the resource pack
`rp_version` - Minimum engine version of the resource pack
`rp_use_metadata` - Also add a metadata field for the resource pack
`rp_authors` - Author names of the resource pack separated by commas. Only included if rp_use_metadata is enabled
`rp_author_url` - Author website of the resource pack. Only included if rp_use_metadata is enabled
`rp_use_ui` - Also enable UI capabilities

fields.name: Parameters (extras)
fields.value: `pack_icon` - The pack icon to be included. Only accepts PNG files
